segments.text: Where are you going to spend your holidays this year , Tom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We may go abroad , my wife wants to go to Egypt , and I'd like to go there too . We haven't made up our mind yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you travel by sea or by air ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We may travel by sea . It's cheaper .
segments.speaker: S2
